application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: 8 x tilia spp, rear garden, re-pollard to allow access for new garden tent, regrowth looks to be 1-2 years old and 1 tilia seems to have 4-5 year growth.overhanging mixed leaved trees to have an end weight reduction by 2-3 m as are long and end weight bearing over seating area and also allow cut back for new garden tent .Sambucas nigra to be felled growing on a sloping raised mound and growing under a tilia which is causing this tree to grow towards the light, putting all weight on the sloping side of raised mound.
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
site_name: The Eagle 215 Askew RoadLondonW12 9AZ
